title: High Fidelity? (Chris White and Robbie Gibb)
itunes:title: High Fidelity? (Chris White and Robbie Gibb)
description:
Boris Johnson went into the cabinet reshuffle suggesting he would reward competence but has he prioritised loyalty? Two former Conservative advisors speak to Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker. Chris White, now of Newington Communications, and Robbie Gibb, senior adviser at Kekst CNC discuss Javid's resignation, why there aren't more women at the table and what's happening with the budget.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
